oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letters from Loyal B. Wort, Co. E, 21st Ohio Inf. Regt., USA to Mrs. S.G. Wort and Esta and Eugene Wort
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two letters are included on this document. Musician Loyal B. Wort, Co. E, 21st Ohio, Inf. Regt., USA writes to both his wife and his two children, Esta and Eugene Wort. Author is writing from a camp at Decherd Station, Tennessee. Wort refers to abolitionists and speaks on political issues, especially the Democrats, in the letter to his wife. In the letter to his children, he reminds them to behave and praises their writing skills.
